releaseNotes:
Don't miss the latest Milano Cortina 2026 news, sports updates and behind the scenes coverage of your favourite events.

We are listening to the opinions of our users and making some changes to give you the best possible Olympic experience. This new version includes:

- Updated content so you don't miss any news from Milano Cortina 2026
- New look for Milano Cortina 2026
- Milano Cortina 2026 events program

We hope you like the new version. Send your feedback to: http://support.olympics.com
description:
Welcome to the Olympic Games™ app, your personal companion to the Games. 
 
Olympic Winter Games: 6 – 22 February 2026 
Paralympic Winter Games: 6 – 15 March 2026 
 
Get up-to-the-second medal results, customised schedules and spectator information, follow the Olympic Torch Relay, and receive breaking news about your favourite athletes and live updates with behind-the-scenes access. The Olympic Games™ app is your go-to resource for the Olympic and Paralympic Games. 
 
With the Olympics app, you can:  
 
• CUSTOMISABLE SCHEDULE: Take control of your Olympic experience. Create your customised lineup of events, so you never miss a moment that matters.  
• GET EXCLUSIVE ACCESS: Gain in-depth insights into Olympic events, receive breaking news and watch live sports.   
• FOLLOW THE OLYMPIC QUALIFIERS: Don’t miss any of the action, see events live from the app when available.  
• SELECT YOUR FAVOURITES: Add all your favourite Olympic events, teams and athletes for insider access straight from the source.    
• ENJOY OLYMPIC SHORTS: Watch exclusive moments from your favourite sports, athletes and teams, capturing the action both on and off the field. 
 
Whether you’re keeping up with the qualifiers, interested in the stories behind events like the Torch Relay and the Opening Ceremony, or simply wanting to learn more about the Olympic Winter Games, this app is the perfect companion.  
 
SCHEDULES AND RESULTS  
 
Stay on top of all the Olympic events. Our handy reminders and customisable schedule help you know when the events you’re interested in are taking place.  
 
OLYMPIC QUALIFIERS 
 
Catch the best moments from the Olympic Qualifiers. Watch highlights and replays of all the action, right from the app. Relive standout performances in freestyle skiing, curling, and more, and discover new stars on the rise. Plus, don’t miss live coverage when it’s available; your front row seat to every unmissable moment. 

OLYMPIC TORCH RELAY

Follow the extraordinary Olympic and Paralympic Torch Relay across Italy towards the Opening Ceremonies of Milan Cortina 2026.
 
MINUTE-BY-MINUTE UPDATES  
 
It’s hard to stay on top of everything that’s going on at the Olympic Winter Games. The Olympic Games™  app allows you to stay up to date with minute-by-minute news on all your favourite events. Don't forget to opt in to push notifications.
 
CUSTOMISED MESSAGING 
 
Create a customised experience by adding all your favourite Olympic events, teams and athletes. That way, you can enjoy content and updates that cater to your Olympic interests.  

OLYMPIC SHOP

Get access to the Olympic Shop, the one-stop destinations for all your Olympic and Milano Cortina 2026 merchandise. From T-shirts and hoodies to pins and mascot plush toys, everything you need to get closer to the games.

PLAY AND WIN!

Are you a superfan? Test your knowledge with Sports Trivia. Play to see how you rank against the world or win Olympic prizes. 

 
PODCASTS AND NEWS  
 
Listen to curated Olympic podcasts that inspire and motivate the athlete in all of us. You’ll find the most in-depth sports coverage right here on the app, and get an exclusive look behind the scenes.  
 
—------------------------------  
 
The app content is available in English, Japanese, Chinese, French, Hindi, Korean, Portuguese, German, Italian, Russian, Arabic and Spanish. Please refer to our terms and conditions and privacy policy for additional information. 
 

Access to streaming of events and video is determined by your TV provider and package and, in some instances, your internet service provider.
